query:
SELECT 
  t.id,
  t.name,
  t.assignedTo,
  GROUP_CONCAT(m.memberName SEPARATOR ', ') as assignedToNames
FROM tasks t
LEFT JOIN JSON_TABLE(
  t.assignedTo,
  '$[*]' COLUMNS(memberId INT PATH '$')
) AS jt
LEFT JOIN household_members m ON m.id = jt.memberId
WHERE t.assignedTo IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.assignedTo
LIMIT 5;
